item.title: Agile Jogging to complement your Sprinting
item.description: Way back when I was first introduced to everything agile from Jezz Santos , we complemented the terminology of our “sprint” with that of a “jog”. Sprinting Sprinting or sprints are the idea of a (usually) timeboxed length of real-world time (5 days, 3 weeks etc) that produces a cadence of focused teamwork on a particular selection of stories. Usually, these stories are prioritised, and the team should be working on the top-most unfinished work.
